# Translator’s Notes

- Shantideva was is a Buddhist master that lived in the eighth century CE
- Book shows clearly how to integrate teaching’s with our daily lives
- Praxis is the most important point behind this text


- our problems exist solely in our head where our illusion of suffering exists
- our problems are our deities
- “the supreme good heart” through practice and release
